## Bands

Use a `band` column base name with `_lower` and `_upper` data to display bands, e.g. confidence intervals, around your lines.

```react
<div>
  <ChartTitle>Entwicklung der Arbeitszufriedenheit nach Einkommensgruppen</ChartTitle>
  <CsvChart
    config={{
      "numberFormat": ".2f",
      "color": "category",
      "band": "confidence95",
      "bandLegend": "95-Prozent-Konfidenzintervall",
      "type": "Line"
    }}
    values={`
category,year,value,confidence95_lower,confidence95_upper
Oberste Einkommen,1991,7.70388503,7.55473859,7.85303157
```
